# gwts-cc

> Git worktree + untracked file sync for Claude Code

[English](README.md) | [ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥](docs/README.ko.md)

## Why?

Git worktrees are great for parallel development, but untracked files (migrations, .env, scripts) don't come along. This plugin syncs them automatically.

## Installation

```bash
/plugin marketplace add BaeSeokJae/gwts-cc
/plugin install gwts-cc@gwts-cc
```

## Usage

```bash
/worktree create feat/my-feature              # Create from main (default)
/worktree create feat/my-feature from dev     # Create from dev branch
/worktree create feat/my-feature from current # Create from current branch
/worktree list                                # List worktrees
/worktree sync                                # Sync files to current worktree
/worktree clean <path>                        # Remove worktree
```

## Configuration

Create `.gwts` in your project root:

```json
{
  "includes": ["migrations/", ".env.example"],
  "mode": "symlink",
  "hooks": { "postCreate": "pnpm install" }
}
```

That's it. Personal overrides go in `.claude/gwts/worktree.json`.

### Options

| Option | Description | Default |
|--------|-------------|---------|
| `includes` | Files/dirs to sync | `[]` |
| `excludes` | Files/dirs to skip | `[]` |
| `mode` | `symlink` or `copy` | `symlink` |
| `hooks.postCreate` | Command after create | - |
| `defaultPath` | Worktree location | `../worktrees` |
| `baseBranch` | Base for new branches | `main` |

### Mode

| Mode | Behavior | Use for |
|------|----------|---------|
| `symlink` | Links to original, changes sync instantly | migrations, shared configs |
| `copy` | Independent copy, no sync | .env.local, credentials |

### Base Branch

Control where new branches are created from:

```bash
/worktree create feat/new              # From baseBranch (main)
/worktree create feat/new from dev     # From dev
/worktree create feat/new from current # From current branch
```

Set default in `.gwts`:
```json
{
  "baseBranch": "develop"
}
```

### Patterns

```json
{
  "includes": [
    "migrations/",          // directory
    ".env.example",         // file
    "apps/*/db/"            // glob
  ]
}
```

## Examples

**Node.js project:**
```json
{
  "includes": ["migrations/", ".env.example"],
  "hooks": { "postCreate": "npm install" }
}
```

**Monorepo:**
```json
{
  "includes": ["packages/*/migrations/", "apps/*/db/"],
  "hooks": { "postCreate": "pnpm install" }
}
```

**Personal config** (`.claude/gwts/worktree.json`):
```json
{
  "includes": [".env.local"],
  "mode": "copy"
}
```

## License

MIT

# Claude Code Cockpit
> Next-generation real-time dashboard for Claude Code [![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0.0-blue.svg)](https://github.com/baeseokjae/claude-code-cockpit) [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg)](./LICENSE) [![Tests](https://img.shields.io/badge/tests-321%20passing-brightgreen.svg)](#-development) [![Node](https://img.shields.io/badge/node-%3E%3D18.0.0-brightgreen.svg)](https://nodejs.org) [English](./README.md) ‚Ä¢ [ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥](./README.ko.md)
Advanced HUD system for Claude Code featuring 5 customizable themes, comprehensive session monitoring, and zero dependencies. ## üöÄ Quick Start ```bash # Install plugin /plugin install claude-code-cockpit # Configure statusline /claude-code-cockpit:setup # View dashboard /claude-code-cockpit:dashboard ``` That's it! Your Claude Code statusline is now enhanced with real-time monitoring. ## üé® Themes 5 premium themes, each WCAG-compliant. ### üåå Aurora (Default) Polar night sky with aurora gradients ‚Äî balanced contrast, eye comfort. ![Aurora Theme](./assets/theme-aurora.svg) ### ‚ö° Neon Cyberpunk fluorescent on deep black ‚Äî high visibility, bold. ![Neon Theme](./assets/theme-neon.svg) ### ‚ö´ Mono Pure black & white ‚Äî ASCII-compatible, maximum accessibility. ![Mono Theme](./assets/theme-mono.svg) ### üßò Zen Calm earth tones ‚Äî focused work, minimal distraction. ![Zen Theme](./assets/theme-zen.svg) ### üì∫ Retro Green phosphor on black ‚Äî classic CRT nostalgia. ![Retro Theme](./assets/theme-retro.svg) ### Theme Comparison | Theme | Contrast | Colors | Use Case | Accessibility | |-------|----------|--------|----------|---------------| | **Aurora** | Medium | üåà Multi-color | General, balanced | ‚úÖ WCAG AA | | **Neon** | High | üé® Bright neon | High-viz, dark mode | ‚úÖ WCAG AAA | | **Mono** | High | ‚ö´‚ö™ B&W only | Maximum compat | ‚úÖ WCAG AAA | | **Zen** | Low | üé® Earth tones | Focus, minimal | ‚úÖ WCAG AA | | **Retro** | Medium | üíö Green mono | Nostalgia | ‚úÖ WCAG AA | ### Switching Themes ```bash # Interactive (recommended) /claude-code-cockpit:configure # Environment variable export COCKPIT_THEME=neon # Config file (~/.claude/plugins/claude-code-cockpit/config.json) { "theme": "zen" } ``` ## ‚ú® Features - **5 Premium Themes** ‚Äî Aurora, Neon, Mono, Zen, Retro with responsive 3-tier layout - **Tool Tracking** ‚Äî Monitor all tool activity with status indicators (‚óê in progress, ‚úì success, ‚úó error) and success rates - **Agent Tracking** ‚Äî Real-time Task subagent monitoring with model display ([h]aiku, [s]onnet, [o]pus) - **Todo Progress** ‚Äî Track TodoWrite task status with completion percentage - **Skill Tracking** ‚Äî Monitor /commit, /review-pr and other skill invocations - **Git Integration** ‚Äî Branch status, dirty indicator, tags, file stats, monorepo & worktree support - **Cost Estimation** ‚Äî Token-based cost calculation per model (Opus/Sonnet/Haiku) - **Token Speed** ‚Äî Real-time tok/s tracking for input/output - **Cache Metrics** ‚Äî Cache hit rate and estimated savings display - **API Usage** ‚Äî 5-hour and 7-day rate limits with reset timers - **Lines Widget** ‚Äî Code additions/removals (+152 -48) - **Bash Error Tracking** ‚Äî Failed commands with exit codes - **Smart Alerts** ‚Äî Context, cost, session duration warnings with configurable thresholds - **Compact Suggestion** ‚Äî Recommends `/compact` when tool calls exceed threshold - **Code Violations** ‚Äî Detect hardcoded secrets, console.log, large files, TODO/FIXME - **Workflow Phase** ‚Äî Auto-detect PLAN/IMPLEMENT/REVIEW phases with confidence scoring - **Test Coverage** ‚Äî Framework-agnostic coverage display (vitest, jest, mocha, ava) - **Pass@k Metrics** ‚Äî AI code generation quality measurement - **MCP Status** ‚Äî Per-server tool usage statistics and impact tracking - **Terminal Hyperlinks** ‚Äî Clickable file paths and GitHub URLs (OSC 8) - **Zero Dependencies** ‚Äî Uses only Node.js built-in modules, < 50ms render, 321 tests passing ## üìã Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/claude-code-cockpit:dashboard` | Full session overview with all statistics | | `/claude-code-cockpit:tools` | Detailed tool usage statistics and history | | `/claude-code-cockpit:agents` | Agent execution details and status | | `/claude-code-cockpit:todos` | Todo list with completion status | | `/claude-code-cockpit:usage` | API usage statistics and rate limits | | `/claude-code-cockpit:setup` | Configure statusline (one-time setup) | | `/claude-code-cockpit:configure` | Interactive theme and display options wizard | All commands read from `/tmp/cockpit-session.md`, which is automatically updated during your session. ## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration ### Environment Variables ```bash export COCKPIT_THEME=aurora # aurora, neon, mono, zen, retro export COCKPIT_PRESET=developer # minimal, developer, full export COCKPIT_DETAIL=1 # 0=off, 1=on (advanced features) export COCKPIT_PATH_LEVELS=2 # directory levels to show ``` ### Presets | Preset | Description | |--------|-------------| | `minimal` | Core only: model, context%, cost, duration. Alerts always on | | `developer` | Default + gitActivity, toolStats enabled | | `full` | All display options enabled | **Priority:** Default ‚Üí Preset ‚Üí User overrides ### Config File `~/.claude/plugins/claude-code-cockpit/config.json`: ```json { "theme": "aurora", "preset": "developer", "detailMode": false, "display": { "showGit": true, "showTools": true, "showAgents": true, "showTodos": true, "showCost": true, "showUsage": true, "showBashErrors": true, "showCompactSuggestion": true, "showViolations": true } } ```
Full Display Options Reference | Option | Default | Description | |--------|---------|-------------| | `showGit` | ‚úÖ | Git branch and status | | `showTools` | ‚úÖ | Tool usage (Read, Edit, Bash, etc.) | | `showAgents` | ‚úÖ | Agent execution status | | `showTodos` | ‚úÖ | Todo progress tracking | | `showSkills` | ‚ùå | Skill invocations (/commit, /review-pr) | | `showUsage` | ‚úÖ | API usage statistics | | `showCost` | ‚úÖ | Cost estimation | | `showAbsoluteTokens` | ‚ùå | Absolute token counts instead of percentages | | `showTokenSpeed` | ‚ùå | Token generation speed (tok/s) | | `showSessionName` | ‚úÖ | Session/plan name in status bar | | `showGitTag` | ‚ùå | Latest git tag next to branch | | `showGitActivity` | ‚ùå | Commits and PRs created during session | | `showGitFileStats` | ‚ùå | Modified/added/deleted file counts | | `showAllBranches` | ‚ùå | Branches from subdirectories (monorepo) | | `showAllBranchesDepth` | 2 | Max depth for subdirectory scanning | | `showGitWorktrees` | ‚ùå | Git worktree status | | `showLines` | ‚úÖ | Code additions/removals (+152 -48) | | `showCacheMetrics` | ‚ùå | Cache hit rate and savings | | `showConfigCounts` | ‚ùå | Count of .claude.md, rules, MCP, hooks | | `showToolStats` | ‚ùå | Overall tool success/failure rate | | `showBashErrors` | ‚úÖ | Failed bash commands with exit codes | | `showCompactSuggestion` | ‚úÖ | `/compact` suggestion when threshold exceeded | | `showViolations` | ‚úÖ | Code violations (secrets, console.log) | | `showMcpImpact` | ‚ùå | MCP server configuration and tool count | | `showWorkflowPhase` | ‚ùå | Current workflow phase (PLAN/IMPLEMENT/REVIEW) | | `showTestCoverage` | ‚ùå | Test coverage percentage | | `showPassAtK` | ‚ùå | Pass@k code generation quality metrics | | `showMcpStatus` | ‚ùå | MCP server usage statistics | | `showPerformanceMetrics` | ‚ùå | Build/test performance (experimental) | | `showInstanceSync` | ‚ùå | Multi-instance sync (experimental) | | `sevenDayThreshold` | 80 | % threshold for 7-day usage warning | **Notification options:** `compactWarningThreshold` (default: 75), `compactSuggestionThreshold` (default: 50) **Usage options:** `usage.enabled` (default: true), `usage.cacheMinutes` (default: 10) **Performance options:** `maxTools` (default: 20), `maxAgents` (default: 20) **Additional options:** `rightMargin` (default: 2), `maxActivityWidgets` (default: 8), `pathLevels` (default: 1)
Example Configurations #### Minimal (Performance-focused) ```json { "theme": "mono", "detailMode": false, "display": { "showGit": true, "showTools": true, "showAgents": false, "showTodos": false, "showUsage": false, "showCost": true }, "performance": { "maxTools": 10, "maxAgents": 5 } } ``` #### Full-Featured (Power User) ```json { "theme": "aurora", "preset": "full", "detailMode": true, "performance": { "maxTools": 50, "maxAgents": 50 } } ``` #### Security-Focused ```json { "theme": "neon", "detailMode": true, "display": { "showViolations": true, "showBashErrors": true } } ```
## üö® Alerts | Alert | Threshold | Display | |-------|-----------|---------| | üî¥ Context Critical | 90%+ | `‚ö† CTX 95%!` (red bold) | | üü° Context Warning | 75-89% | `‚ö† CTX 80%` (yellow) | | üí∞ High Cost | $1.00+ | Cost highlighted | | ‚è∞ Long Session | 30m+ / 60m+ | Session time highlighted | | üì¶ Compact Suggestion | 50+ tool calls | `‚ö†Ô∏è 75 calls try /compact` | | üìä API Usage | 80%+ (5h/7d) | `‚ö†Ô∏è 5h:85%` in yellow/red | Configure thresholds in `notifications` section of config file. ## üöÄ Installation ### Prerequisites - **Claude Code** 2.0+ - **Node.js** 18.0.0+ - **Terminal** with ANSI color support (recommended: iTerm2, VSCode Terminal, Windows Terminal, Kitty) ### Method 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash /plugin install claude-code-cockpit /claude-code-cockpit:setup /claude-code-cockpit:dashboard ``` ### Method 2: Manual Installation ```bash git clone https://github.com/baeseokjae/claude-code-cockpit.git cd claude-code-cockpit pnpm install pnpm build pnpm link --global ``` Then in Claude Code: ```bash /plugin install /claude-code-cockpit:setup ``` ### Method 3: Development Mode ```bash pnpm dev # Watch mode # In another terminal cc --plugin-dir . # Or test stdin directly echo '{"model":{"display_name":"Opus"}}' | node dist/index.js ``` ## üì¶ Development ### Getting Started ```bash git clone https://github.com/baeseokjae/claude-code-cockpit.git cd claude-code-cockpit pnpm install pnpm build # Build once pnpm dev # Watch mode ``` ### Testing 321 tests across 27 test files (270+ unit, 16 integration, 25 theme tests). ```bash pnpm test # Run all tests pnpm test:watch # Watch mode pnpm test:coverage # Coverage report pnpm test:update-snapshots # Update snapshots pnpm lint # Type check ```
Manual Testing & Debugging ```bash # Basic test echo '{"model":{"display_name":"Opus"},"context_window":{"used_percentage":45},"cwd":"/test"}' | node dist/index.js # Debug mode echo '{"model":{"display_name":"Opus"}}' | DEBUG=* node dist/index.js # Specific debug namespaces DEBUG=main,git,transcript node dist/index.js < sample.json # (27 namespaces available - use DEBUG=* to see all) ```
### Contributing 1. Fork and clone the repository 2. Create a branch (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`) 3. Write tests for your changes 4. Ensure tests pass (`pnpm test`) and type check (`pnpm lint`) 5. Commit and create a Pull Request **PR checklist:** - [ ] Tests pass (`pnpm test`) - [ ] Type check passes (`pnpm lint`) - [ ] Documentation updated - [ ] Follows existing code style ## üôè Inspired By - **[jarrodwatts/claude-hud](https://github.com/jarrodwatts/claude-hud)** ‚Äì Original inspiration for terminal-based HUD plugin for Claude Code - **Terminal powerline tools** ‚Äì Inspired the multi-tier responsive layout system ## üìÑ License MIT License - see [LICENSE](./LICENSE) for details.
